1307: You entered the verification code incorrectly, please enter the verification code sent to your mobile phone.
Bir hata oluştu! Lütfen tekrar deneyiniz: Something went wrong! Please try again.
Cep telefonunuza gelen kodu girmeniz içi: Time to enter the code sent to your mobile phone:
İlgili HGN kodunu açıklama kısmına yazar: You can complete your payment within 24 hours by typing the relevant HGN code in the description section of transfer.
İşlem sırasında hata oluştu. Lütfen tekr: Error occured during transaction process. Please try again. Redirecting...
İşleminiz tamamlanıyor. Lütfen bekleyini: Your transaction is completing. Please wait.
Lütfen sayfayı kapatmayınız!: Please do not close the page!
Mesai saatleri dışında gerçekleştirilen: Interbank transactions performed outside working hours will be processed on the first business day following.
Mobil ödemelerde operatörünüze bağlı ola: Additional charges may apply for mobile payments depending on your carrier!
MobilText1: After confirming, wait a few seconds for the process to complete. By confirming this payment, you agree to the {{cellOperator}} mobile payment framework agreement.
MobilText2: Complete the process by replying to the message sent to +{{phoneNumber}}
Yapacağınız işlemler 256 Bit SSL serfiti: Your transactions are protected by the 256 Bit SSL certificate and are not shared with any third party organizations or organizations. You can make all your payments safely.
Yatırılan tutar ile alışveriş yapılmak i: Your payment will not be approved if the amount deposited is not the same as the amount of purchase.
numarasına gelen mesajı yanıtlayarak işl: Complete the process by replying to the message sent to {{phoneNumber}}
Ödeme işleminiz için birazdan operatörle: You will be contacted by our customer representatives in a short time to complete your payment.
Ödeme işleminizi başlatmak için lütfen c: To initiate your payment, please enter your mobile phone number and click “Send Verification Code” button.
